title: France panorama. [No. 66/50]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items: Christmas in Paris - Highlights the various French customs involved with celebrating Christmas including the consuming of shellfish, decorating the city streets and shop fronts, and attending Church. Also includes images of the homeless in Paris being given special packages for this festive date.
